snippet.title: Lindwyrm | Early Access OUT NOW | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
100 % Gameplay, 100% Lindwyrm!

Dive into the adventure, become the hero  🖛 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2280020/Lindwyrm/
_______________
Lindwyrm combines hack‘n‘slay combat, platforming, puzzling and housing in the shell of a roguelite action RPG. Crawl into thrilling dungeons, slay epic bosses with your weapon of choice, enhance your hero, and rebuild a destroyed village in this co-op adventure.
_______________
💬Join our community:

🔺DISCORD https://discord.com/invite/rnMynbRpcC
🔺TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/ghostwhalegames
🔺TWITTER/X: https://twitter.com/GhostwhaleGG
🔺THREADS: https://www.threads.net/@ghostwhalegames
🔺TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@ghostwhalegames 
🔺INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/ghostwhalegames/

#roguelike #action #rpg #gaming #steam #indiegame
